name: Fabric UK
overview:
Fabrics Importers Here at Fabric UK we import and distribute fabrics to all areas of the UK, working directly with fabric warehouses, fabric manufactures and fabric exporters around the world. This gives us an edge to stay ahead of the game.

Overseas liaison offices and partners help to keep an eye on fabric qualities to ensure delivery deadlines are met.

Majority of our fabric imports coming into our fabric warehouse are from the following countries

China India Pakistan Korea Taiwan Germany Turkey Indonesia Thailand

Our products range from Silk, Polycotton, Viscose, Nylon, Cotton Blends, Denims, Lace Fabric, Fleece, Waterproof fabric, canvas, calico, hessian, jute, linings, fire retardant display fabrics, fire retardant voiles, wide width fabrics, blackout fabric and a lot more in woven and knitted fabrics.

All stock items are available for next day delivery to most parts of mainland UK.

We also work with forward ordering, if you have a request for any special fabrics, textures, weight or finishes please call us to discuss your needs or simply post us a sample of your fabric with a specification. We will contact you with a competitive quote, please note there are minimum order quantities that apply.
